pullrequest.title: Inline namespace with project major version

content.raw:
Are we sure that inline namespaces are supported by Visual Studio? The Windows tests are failing. 

**Update**: doing a quick search, it seems that `inline namespaces` are only supported in VS 2015 ([see here](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh567368.aspx)). If that's the case, do we want to drop support for VS 2013 in the next release?
content.html:
Are we sure that inline namespaces are supported by Visual Studio? The Windows tests are failing.

Update: doing a quick search, it seems that inline namespaces are only supported in VS 2015 (see here). If that's the case, do we want to drop support for VS 2013 in the next release?
